titles.title: To modify and extend the suspension of duty on certain cases or containers used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys or devices.
To modify and extend the suspension of duty on certain cases or containers used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys or devices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of certain cases or containers used for electronic drawing toys, electronic games, or educational toys or devices; and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such articles.
